    • Class com.example.navalbattle.models.MainTable

      class MainTable extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • board
          int[][] board
          A 10x10 grid representing the game board. Each cell can be either 0 (water) or a number corresponding to a ship.
        • random
          Random random
          A random number generator used for placing ships and selecting shots.
        • shipCoordinatesList
          List<int[]> shipCoordinatesList
          A list storing the coordinates and related data for each ship. The array contains: - row index (int) - column index (int) - additional ship-related data (e.g., orientation, type).
        • ships
          ArrayList<Ship> ships
          A list of ships placed on the board. Ships are defined by their size and amount of occurrences.
        • shotGrid
          int[][] shotGrid
          A 10x10 grid representing the shot history grid. Each cell is either 0 (no shot), 1 (hit), or 2 (miss).
        • shots
          List<int[]> shots
          A list storing the coordinates of the shots fired by the machine.

        • positionTable

    • Class com.example.navalbattle.models.PositionTable

      class PositionTable extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • positionTable
          int[][] positionTable
          The 10x10 matrix representing the player's table where ships are placed.
        • shipCoordinatesList
          List<int[]> shipCoordinatesList
          A list of coordinates that stores the positions of all placed ships.
        • ships
          ArrayList<Ship> ships
          A list that stores information about ships, including their size, type, and remaining amount.
        • shotGrid
          int[][] shotGrid
          The 10x10 grid for tracking shots fired on the board.
